maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/4.text:
\i[arrow-n] Place du Marché
\i[arrow-s] Arcade des Débutants

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Canonical NPC
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: PNJ Bateau

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Welcome to Rookie Harbor!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Bienvenue à Rookie Harbor !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hey!\. It's nice here in the shade, isn't it?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Hé !\. C'est bien ici à l'ombre, non ?
... Salut ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Your friend's still not here. What's the holdup?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ton ami est toujours pas là. Il fait quoi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I dunno... he said he'd arrive around this time.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je sais pas... Il a dit qu'il arriverait dans ces eaux-là.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Maybe he's stuck in Rhombus Square, watching the city from afar... you know how it is...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Peut-être qu'il est encore à Rhombus Square, en train d'admirer la ville de loin... Tu sais comment il est...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yeah... Can't wait to finally enter that place, too!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ouais... Moi aussi je suis impatient d'aller là-dedans !
... Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...Oh! Hey!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... Oh ! Hé !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Is something the matter?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ... Oh well... Ever notice how that tree has fruit?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... Bon OK... Tu as déjà remarqué que cet arbre avait des fruits ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I heard those are not instant matter but actual fruit!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: J'ai cru comprendre que ce n'était pas de l'instant-matière, mais des vrais fruits !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Now I really wonder how they taste...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Maintenant je me demande vraiment quel goût ils ont...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh well... it's not like you can eat real-life fruit as an avatar.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Oui bon, C'est pas comme si c'était possible de manger des vrais fruits en tant qu'avatar...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: [acquiesce]
... Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hey there.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Coucou toi.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...You seem kinda lost...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... Tu as l'air vraiment perdue...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: If you're waiting for somebody, this is the right spot.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Si tu attends quelqu'un, c'est l'endroit idéal.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Pretty much everyone here is waiting for new players arriving from Cross Central.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Un peu tout le monde ici attend des nouveaux joueurs qui viennent de Cross Central.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's a popular meetup spot.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est un point de rencontre connu.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ... You seem to be a new player, too. So you know what I mean, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... Tu as l'air d'être aussi un nouveau joueur. Donc tu dois savoir de quoi je parle, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...You're a quiet one, I see.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... T'es plutôt silencieuse, à ce que je vois.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: They are late...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Bon sang, ils sont où ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: C'mon, relax. There is still time.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est bon, calme-toi. On a encore le temps.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: The raid is scheduled in 10 minutes.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Le Raid est prévu dans 10 minutes.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Nothing is planned. It's going to be a mess...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: On a rien préparé du tout. Ça va être un désastre...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Don't be so serious about it. It's supposed to be fun, remember?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Pas besoin d'en faire un drame. C'est un jeu, on est censé s'amuser, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: All that water... makes you want to jump right into it!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Toute cette eau... Ça donne envie de sauter dedans !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Not sure I'd do that with your amount of armor.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Pas sûr que ça soit une bonne idée vu ton armure.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Also, you'd just dissolve and respawn.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: En plus tu vas juste te dissoudre et réapparaitre.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Killjoy.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: CasseJoie

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Mh... I swear there was an entrance here...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mmm... J'étais sûr qu'il y avait une entrée ici...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hey!\. Over here!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Hé !\. Par ici !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Look at all these old style buildings!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Regarde un peu toutes ces vieilles maisons !
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.note: de:cottage, which, in french, is chaumiere, so no.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's like we are in some kind of medieval fantasy world, non?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est comme si on était dans une sorte d'univers médiéval fantastique, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So...\. Right now I'm waiting here to meet a friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Sinon...\. Là maintenant, j'attends un ami.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But I haven't seen him so far.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais pour l'instant je l'ai pas encore vu.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: There are just so many people here...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Il y a juste trop de monde ici...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: HOLERÖ!\.\.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: HOLERÖ !\.\.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Eeek!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ahhh !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Gyahahaha!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Gyahahaha !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Sacrebleu!\. Was that really necessary?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Sacrebleu !\. T'étais vraiment obligé de faire ça ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yes, very necessary.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Oui, c'était obligé.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I see you brought a friend?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je vois que tu as amené une amie ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ah oui, that's Lea!\. I met her during the tutorial.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ah oui, c'est Lea !\. Je l'ai rencontrée pendant les tutoriels.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: And this dark lord meanie here is \c[3]Lukas\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Et ce méchant seigneur des ténèbres là, c'est \c[3]Lukas\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Also known as \c[3]Schneider\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Aussi connu sous le nom de \c[3]Schneider\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Nice to meet you, Lea!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ravi de te rencontrer, Lea !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So you finally reached the \c[3]Croissant\c[0].\. Having fun so far?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Donc vous êtes finalement arrivé sur le \c[3]Croissant\c[0].\. Ça vous a plu pour l'instant ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oui, énormément!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Oui, énormément !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Wait...\. Croissant?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Attends...\. Croissant ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: The mainland.\. You'll get the idea once you see the map.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Le continent.\. Tu comprendras quand tu verras la carte.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Anyway, this is \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].\. It's known for the incoming shipments of rookies like you.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: En tout cas, ici c'est \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].\. Une ville connue pour ses arrivages réguliers de petits nouveaux comme vous.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's also a fairly big place, which tends to be confusing for said rookies.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est aussi un lieu assez grand, où ces-dit nouveaux ont tendance à se perdre.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So I thought I'd give you a small tour!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Donc je me disais que je pourrais vous faire faire un petit tour pour montrer un peu l'endroit !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Très bien!\. Lead the way!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Très bien !\. Après toi !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: \c[3]Schneider\c[0] is kind enough to show you around Rookie Harbor. Just follow him together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: \c[3]Schneider\c[0] est si gentil qu'il va vous faire visiter Rookie Harbor. Suivez-le avec \c[3]Emilie\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ah I see, you now can open the golden chests.\. Congrats!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ah, je vois que tu peux ouvrir les coffres en or.\. Félicitations !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Lea!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Lea !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Wondering about this chest, hm?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Tu te poses des questions sur ce coffre, hm ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yeah you can't open it yet.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ouais, tu peux pas encore l'ouvrir.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But you will be able to do it later in the game.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais plus tard dans le jeu, tu pourras l'ouvrir.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: You might want to add a \c[3]stamp\c[0] on your \c[3]map\c[0] to remember it.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Peut-être que tu devrais poser un \c[3]marqueur\c[0] sur ta \c[3]carte\c[0] pour ne pas oublier ce trésor.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: In case you don't know what I mean, just have a closer look at the \c[3]map menu\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Au cas où tu ne comprendrais pas de quoi je parle, regarde mieux ton \c[3]menu carte\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh, a present? For me?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Oh, un cadeau ? pour moi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Thanks! I don't know why, but lately random people just give me stuff for free.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Merci ! Je ne sais pas pourquoi, mais ces derniers temps, plein de gens que je connais pas me donnent des trucs.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I love it!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: J'adore ça !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: First, the \c[3]info building\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Tout d'abord, le \c[3]Bâtiment d'information\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: If you really want to dig into all the details of CrossWorlds, this is your place.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Si vous voulez vraiment connaître tous les détails de CrossWorlds, c'est là qu'il faut être.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Combat arts, skills, all the stats from A to Z, you name it.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Arts de combats, Circuits, Toutes les stats de A à Z, tout ce que vous voulez.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh!\. That's the "Nerd Hub", right?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Oh !\. C'est le "Repère des Intellos", non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ja, people call it that.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ja, les gens l'appellent comme ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Frankly, it's a good thing to know about all that stuff.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais franchement, c'est utile de connaitre tout ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But it's not mandatory.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais ce n'est vraiment pas obligatoire.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's just a place to go back to whenever you're confused about something.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: C'est juste un bon endroit où aller si vous ne comprenez pas quelque chose.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Let's move on!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Allez on continue !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: By the way...\. "Emilienator"?\. Nice one.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: D'ailleurs...\. "Emilienator"?\. C'est bien trouvé.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I know!\. What's "Schneider" supposed to mean?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je sais !\. Et euh...\. Pourquoi "Schneider" ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I'm a \c[3]Triblader\c[0].\. I cut things.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je suis un \c[3]Triblader\c[0].\. Je tranche des trucs.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...\. What?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ...\. Hein ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Not worth explaining.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Pas la peine d'expliquer.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Awww...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ohhh...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oi, Lea!\. Why are you running away?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Hé, Lea !\. Pourquoi tu t'enfuies ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I promise, I'll make it short!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Je serai pas long, c'est promis !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Shady Shorsh
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Carlos la Carotte

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Shady Shorsh
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Carlos la Carotte

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ahh!\. Y... you again?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ahh !\. E... Encore vous ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Okay... I guess that's the end of the line then.\. It's really a shame...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: OK... J'imagine que je suis au bout du rouleau alors.\. C'est vraiment dommage...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...that you're so slow!!\.\. Byeeeee\..\..\..
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ... que vous soyez si lente !!\.\. Byeeeee\..\..\..

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig:
And so the days went by with a game 
populated by both players and Evotars.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text:
Et donc les jours passèrent dans un jeu
habité par des joueurs et des Évotars.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Finally we set foot on the great continent of the croissant!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Enfin nous marchons sur le grand continent du croissant !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Entering \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Et on entre à \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: To the right, you'll find the Info Hub.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: À votre droite, vous trouverez le Point d'Information.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: A great place if...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Un bon endroit, si...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Japp, that's such a nice tree to run around, isn't it?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Japp, cet arbre est vraiment idéal pour tourner autour, pas vrai ?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Look, I get it.\. Who cares about the boring Info Hub!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Bon, j'ai compris.\. Ça n'intéresse personne, le Point d'Information !

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Still, it's a place you might want to remember for later.\. Just saying.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Mais vous pourriez avoir besoin de vous en souvenir pour plus tard.\.  Je dis ça comme ça.
